synopsis.text: Shida Kuroha, a charming and caring girl-next-door, confesses her feelings to her childhood friend, Sueharu Maru. Despite her endearing qualities, Maru is smitten by the beautiful and accomplished school idol, Kachi Shirokusa, who is also an award-winning author. Maru believes he has a chance with Shirokusa when she frequently engages him in conversation with a captivating smile. However, his dreams are crushed when he discovers that Shirokusa is already in a relationship. Devastated, Maru spirals into despair, but Kuroha proposes a plan to lift his spirits: a grand scheme for revenge.
